Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: elm-review

Arguments.Name: --help
Arguments.Description: Show help for elm-review

Arguments.Name: --unsuppress
Arguments.Description: Include suppressed errors in the error report for all rules

Arguments.Name: --rules
Arguments.Description: Run with a subsection of the rules in the configuration. Specify them by their name, and separate them by commas

Arguments.Name: <rule1,rule2,...>
Arguments.Description: <rule1,rule2,...>

Arguments.Name: --watch
Arguments.Description: Re-run elm-review automatically when your project or configuration changes

Arguments.Name: --watch-code
Arguments.Description: Re-run elm-review automatically when your project changes

Arguments.Name: --elmjson
Arguments.Description: Specify the path to the elm.json file of the project

Arguments.Name: <path-to-elm.json>
Arguments.Description: <path-to-elm.json>

Arguments.Name: --config
Arguments.Description: Use the review configuration in the specified directory

Arguments.Name: <path-to-review-directory>
Arguments.Description: <path-to-review-directory>

Arguments.Name: --template
Arguments.Description: Use the review configuration from a GitHub repository

Arguments.Name: <author>/<repo>[/path-to-the-config-folder][#branch-or-commit]
Arguments.Description: <author>/<repo>[/path-to-the-config-folder][#branch-or-commit]

Arguments.Name: --compiler
Arguments.Description: Specify the path to the elm compiler

Arguments.Name: <path-to-elm>
Arguments.Description: <path-to-elm>

Arguments.Name: --version
Arguments.Description: Print the version of the elm-review CLI

Arguments.Name: --debug
Arguments.Description: Add helpful information to debug your configuration or rules

Arguments.Name: --report
Arguments.Description: Error reports will be in JSON format

Arguments.Name: json or ndjson
Arguments.Description: json or ndjson

Arguments.Name: json
Arguments.Description: Prints a single JSON object

Arguments.Name: ndjson
Arguments.Description: Print one JSON object per error each on a new line

Arguments.Name: --no-details
Arguments.Description: Hide the details from error reports for a more compact view

Arguments.Name: --ignore-dirs
Arguments.Description: Ignore the reports of all rules for the specified directories

Arguments.Name: <dir1,dir2,...>
Arguments.Description: <dir1,dir2,...>

Arguments.Name: --ignore-files
Arguments.Description: Ignore the reports of all rules for the specified files

Arguments.Name: <file1,file2,...>
Arguments.Description: <file1,file2,...>

Arguments.Name: --fix
Arguments.Description: Elm Review will present fixes for the errors that offer an automatic fix, which you can then accept or refuse one by one

Arguments.Name: --fix-all
Arguments.Description: Elm Review will present a single fix containing the application of all available automatic fixes, which you can then accept or refuse

Arguments.Name: --elm-format-path
Arguments.Description: Specify the path to elm-format

Arguments.Name: <path-to-elm-format>
Arguments.Description: <path-to-elm-format>

Arguments.Name: --fix-limit
Arguments.Description: Limit the number of fixes applied in a single batch to N

Arguments.Name: N
Arguments.Description: N

Arguments.Name: --extract
Arguments.Description: Enable extracting data from the project for the rules that have a data extractor. Requires running with --report=json. Learn more by reading the section about "Extracting information" at https://bit.ly/3UmNr0V

Arguments.Name: --benchmark-info
Arguments.Description: Print out how much time it took for rules and phases of the process to run. This is meant for benchmarking purposes

Arguments.Name: --no-color
Arguments.Description: Disable colors in the output

Arguments.Name: files or directories to review
Arguments.Description: files or directories to review

Arguments.Name: init
Arguments.Description: Initialize Elm Review in this directory

Arguments.Name: --help
Arguments.Description: Show help for elm-review init

Arguments.Name: --config
Arguments.Description: Create the configuration files in the specified directory instead of in the review/ directory

Arguments.Name: <path-to-review-directory>
Arguments.Description: <path-to-review-directory>

Arguments.Name: --template
Arguments.Description: Copy the review configuration from a GitHub repository, at the root or in a folder

Arguments.Name: <author>/<repo>[/path-to-the-config-folder][#branch-or-commit]
Arguments.Description: <author>/<repo>[/path-to-the-config-folder][#branch-or-commit]

Arguments.Name: --compiler
Arguments.Description: Specify the path to the elm compiler

Arguments.Name: <path-to-elm>

Arguments.Description: Checks whether there are uncommitted suppression files

Arguments.Name: --unsuppress
Arguments.Description: Include suppressed errors in the error report for all rules

Arguments.Name: --unsuppress-rules
Arguments.Description: Include suppressed errors in the error report for all rules

Arguments.Description: <rule1,rule2,...>
